content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Connected by pipes forming a fluid system

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5)

### Pipe groups
Consists of:
- PipeGroup for steam (position -18.5, 16.5)
- PipeGroup for water (position -12.5, 21.5)
- Multiple empty PipeGroups at various positions

### Electricity poles
Consists of:
- Small electric poles at positions (-16.5, 21.5), (-16.5, 20.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 20.5), (-19.5, 22.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items from an empty inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to insufficient resources for crafting
- Check the required ingredients for crafting in assembling machines and ensure you have them available in your inventory.
